mapper.sql: a.ID as id, a.ACCOUNT_ID as accountId, a.AGREEMENT_NUMBER as agreementNumber, a.ACCOUNT_NAME as accountName, a.SIGNATURE as signature, a.SIGNATURE_TIME as signatureTime, a.STATUS as status, a.CREATED_BY as createdBy, a.CREATED_DATE as createdDate, a.UPDATED_BY as updatedBy, a.UPDATED_DATE as updatedDate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PAR_AGREEMENT( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , AGREEMENT_NUMBER , ACCOUNT_NAME , SIGNATURE , SIGNATURE_TIME , STATUS , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{accountId} , #{agreementNumber} , #{accountName} , #{signature} , #{signatureTime} , #{status} , #{createdBy} , #{createdDate} , #{updatedBy} , #{updatedDate} )

INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PAR_AGREEMENT
ID ,
ACCOUNT_ID ,
AGREEMENT_NUMBER ,
ACCOUNT_NAME ,
SIGNATURE ,

STATUS ,

#{accountId} ,

mapper.update:
UPDATE ACCOUNT_PAR_AGREEMENT
ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} ,
AGREEMENT_NUMBER = #{agreementNumber} ,
ACCOUNT_NAME = #{accountName} ,
SIGNATURE = #{signature} ,
SIGNATURE_TIME = #{signatureTime} ,
STATUS = #{status} ,
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} ,
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} ,
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} ,
UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate}
WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PAR_AGREEMENT( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , AGREEMENT_NUMBER , ACCOUNT_NAME , SIGNATURE , SIGNATURE_TIME , STATUS , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE )
SELECT #{item.id} , #{item.accountId} , #{item.agreementNumber} , #{item.accountName} , #{item.signature} , #{item.signatureTime} , #{item.status} , #{item.createdBy} , #{item.createdDate} , #{item.updatedBy} , #{item.updatedDate} FROM DUAL

update.foreach: UPDATE ACCOUNT_PAR_AGREEMENT SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{item.accountId} , AGREEMENT_NUMBER = #{item.agreementNumber} , ACCOUNT_NAME = #{item.accountName} , SIGNATURE = #{item.signature} , SIGNATURE_TIME = #{item.signatureTime} , STATUS = #{item.status} , CREATED_BY = #{item.createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{item.createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{item.updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{item.updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{item.id}

mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT_PAR_AGREEMENT SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} , AGREEMENT_NUMBER = #{agreementNumber} , ACCOUNT_NAME = #{accountName} , SIGNATURE = #{signature} , SIGNATURE_TIME = #{signatureTime} , STATUS = #{status} , CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM ACCOUNT_PAR_AGREEMENT a WHERE a.ID = #{id}
